original: 《三國演義》虛構的人物，張魯屬下，楊柏之兄。愛財貪汙，先收受劉備賄賂，離間張魯馬超；後又收賄充當內應，使曹軍順利攻克漢中。
text: A fictitious character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms", under Zhang Lu, the brother of Yang Bai. Loving money and corruption, he first accepted bribes from Liu Bei and separated Zhang Lu and Ma Chao; later he accepted bribes as an internal response, enabling Cao Jun to successfully conquer Hanzhong.
